text.value: 1.1. Name of Health facility (After HF name write in brackets Attended/Not Attended training)
2.6. No of months in your profession
2.6.1 No of months in your workstation
3.1. Have you heard of a disease called brucellosis?
If no to Q 3.1; end the questionnaire and move on to next eligible person
3.3. Where did you get informed about brucellosis?
Other ways you got informed about brucellosis
4. Brucellosis transmission: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements
4.1. Brucellosis affects domestic ruminants (cattle, sheep, goats)
4.3. Brucellosis can be transmitted from cattle to humans
4.4. Brucellosis can be transmitted from sheep/goats to humans
4.5. A person could acquire brucellosis by drinking raw/un-pastoralized milk
4.6. A person could acquire brucellosis by contact with aborted foetuses or placenta
4. Brucellosis transmission: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements
4.7. A person could acquire brucellosis by eating meat, liver or spleen not well cooked
4.8. Sexual transmission of brucellosis can occur in humans
4.9. A person can acquire brucellosis by inhaling aerosolized bacteria
4.10. A person can acquire brucellosis through breaks in the skin or mucous membranes
4.11. A person can acquire brucellosis through blood transfusion from infected person
4.12. A person can acquire brucellosis through transplacental transfer from infected person
4.13. A person can acquire brucellosis through contact with menstrual blood from infected person
5. Clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements. The common clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis include
5. Clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements. The common clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis include
5.12. Inflammation of the epididymis and/or testicle
6. Awareness on diagnosis. On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements. Diagnosis of brucellosis can be made through
6.1. History of prolonged at least a week by presence of clinical signs like repeated fever,
6.2. Patient's history of exposure to likely sources of the disease
7.1. Do you advise clients/patients to get tested for brucellosis?
7.2. Do you provide any tests that can be used to diagnose brucellosis in humans in this facility? Yes___No___
7.3. If yes to Qn 7.2; mention the tests
7.4. What human samples do you take for diagnosis of brucellosis?
7.4.1 Other human samples taken for diagnosis of brucellosis
7.5. How many cases of brucellosis have you ever suspected in patients who attended this facility during the past 1 month?
7.6. How many cases of brucellosis have you ever confirmed in this facility over the past 1 month?
7.7. How frequently do you consider brucellosis diagnosis for patients attending this facility?
7.8. Do you have test reagents for brucellosis in this facility?
7.9. If yes to Q7.8; what reagents do you have in place
7.10. Do you refer samples elsewhere for brucellosis testing?
7.11. If yes to Qn 7.10; where do you refer
7.12. If you refer samples to testing elsewhere; do you get feedback on results?
7.13. How long it usually takes to receive resulting from referral point?
7.14. How do you receive results from referral point?
7.15. Do you communicate results from referral point to patients?
7.16. How do you communicate test results to patients?
7.17. Do you have guidelines for diagnosis and management of brucellosis?
7.18. If yes to Q7.17; ask to see guidelines: Guidelines seen
8. Prevention and control: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements. Brucellosis can be prevented by:
8.2. Eating meat, liver or spleen well cooked
8.3. Control of brucellosis in human depends much on control of the disease in animals
8.5. Wearing gloves when handling aborted foetuses or placenta
8.6. Washing hands after close contact with animals and/or their products
9. Attitude: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements.
9.1. Brucellosis is an important public health disease in Tanzania
9.2. Brucellosis affects mostly the pastoral communities
9.4. Inadequate knowledge and awareness of brucellosis amongst the FHWs contribute to misdiagnosis of the disease
9.5. Brucellosis can be prevented and controlled through collaborative strategy between animal and human health sectors
9. Attitude: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements.
9.6. Use of guidelines or reference materials can enhance appropriate diagnosis and management of brucellosis
9.7. Engagement of community health workers in event-based surveillance can enhance early detection and reporting of brucellosis suspected cases
9.8. Public awareness is important for disease prevention and control
9.9. Use of mobile-phone-based technology can enhance early detection and communication of test results compared with paper-based system

11. Challenges and recommendations: What are the challenges the FHWs face in the diagnosis and management of brucellosis (probe for possible solutions)
11.4. Unspecific nature of clinical signs and symptoms of the disease
11.6. Late presentation of the cases to health facility
11.7. Inadequate collaboration with other relevant sectors

12.1 What type of mobile phone do you own?

2.6. Namba ya miezi katika taaluma yako
2.6.1 Namba ya miezi katika kituo cha kazi yako
Mshiriki lazima awe na umri wa miaka 18 au zaidi
3. UELEWA WA JUMLA JUU YA BRUSELA
Kama hapana kwa swali 3.1; sitisha mahojiano na endelea na mshiriki mwingine
3. UELEWA WA JUMLA JUU YA BRUSELA
3.2 Je, ni mdudu gani anasababisha brusela
3.3. Je, ulipata wapi taarifa zinazohusiana na brusela?
Maeneo mengine ulio pata taarifa zinazohusiana na brusela?
4. Maambukizi ya brusela: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo:
4.1. Brusela inadhuru ng’ombe, mbuzi na kondoo
4.3. Brusela inaweza kuambukizwa kutoka kwa ng’ombe kwenda kwa binadamu
4.4. Brusela inaweza kuambukizwa kutoka kwa mbuzi/kondoo kwenda kwa binadamu
4.5. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kunywa mzaziwa yasiyochemshwa
4.6. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kugusa mimba iliyotoka kwa mnyama ama kondo la nyuma la mnyama mwenye maambukizi
4. Maambukizi ya brusela: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo:
4.7. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kula nyama ama kongosho lisilopikwa vizuri
4.8. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa njia ya ngono
4.9. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kwa kuvuta hewa yenye vimelea vya ugonjwa
4.10. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kupitia mipasuko katika ngozi
4.11. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kuwekewa damu isiyo salama
4.12. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kupandikizwa kiumbe katika mfumo wa uzazi kutoka kwa mtu mwenye maambukizi
4.13. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kugusa damu ya hedhi ya mtu aliye na maambukizi
5. Dalili za brusela kwa binadamu: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
5.1. Kuwa na homa zisizokoma ama za kujirudia
5. Dalili za brusela kwa binadamu: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
5.12. Kuvimba kwa mishipa ya uzazi kwa mwanaume ama kuvimba korodani
6. Uchunguzi wa brusela: Dalili za brusela kwa binadamu: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo:
6.1. Kuwepo kwa dalili za muda mrefu zinazohusiana na brusela hasa homa
6.2. Historia ya mgonjwa kukutana na vitu hatarishi vya maambukizi
7.1. Je, huwa unawaelekeza wagonjwa wanaokuja hapa kupima brusela?
7.2. Je, huwa mna kipimo cha brusela kwa binadamukatika kituo hiki?
7.3. Kama jibu ni ndiyo kwa swali Qn 7.2; taja kipimo mlichonacho
7.4. Je huwa unachukua sampuli gani kutoka kwa mgonjwa kwa ajili ya kupima brusela?
7.4.1 sampuli gani zingine kutoka kwa mgonjwa kwa ajili ya kupima brusela?
7.5. Je, ni wagonjwa wangapi mliwahisi kuwa na brusela kwa kipindi cha mwezi 1 uliopita?
7.6. Je, ni wagonjwa wangapi mlihakiki kuwa wameugua brusela kwa kipindi cha mwezi 1 uliopita?
7.7. Je, ni kwa kiasi gani huwa unachunguza brusela kwa wagonjwa wanaohudhuria katika kituo hiki?
7.8. Je, mnavyo kemikali za kuchunguza brusela katika kituo hiki?
7.9. Ikiwa jibu ni ndiyo kwa swali 7.8; ni kemikali zipi mlizo nazo kwa sasa
7.10. Je, huwa unapeleka sampuli mahala pengine kuchunguza brusela
7.11. Ikiwa jibu kwa swali 7.10 ni ndiyo; taja sehemu unayopeleka
7.12. Ikiwa unapeleka samupuli mahala pengine kuchunguzwa; huwa unapata mrejesho wa majibu?
7.13. Huwa inachukua muda gani kupta majibu kutoka sehemu uliyopeleka sampuli kuchunguzwa?
tunayafuata na kyachukua yakiwa katika karatasi
7.15. Je, huwa unawasilisha kwa mgonjwa majibu uliyoyapata ?
7.16. Je, huwa unawasilishaje majibu kwa mgonjwa?
7.17. Je, unayo miongozo ya uchunguzi na matibabu ya brusela?
7.18. Ikiwa jibu ni ndiyo kwa swali 7.17; uliza kuona miongozo: Miongozo imeonekana
8. Kudhibiti na kuzuia: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo. Brusela inaweza kuzuiliwa kwa:
8.3. Udhibiti wa brusela kwa binadamu unategemea sana udhibiti wake kwa wanyama
8.5. Kuvaa mipira-kinga wakati wa kusaidia Wanyama kuzaa
8.6. Kunawa mikono baada ya kushika nyama ama mnyama
8.7. Utupaji ulio sahihi wa uchafu unaoweza kuwa na maambukizi
9. Mtazamo: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
9.2. Brusela inadhuru Zaidi jamii za wafugaji
9.4. Kutokuwepo kwa uelewa na ufahamu mzuri kwa wataalamu wa afya kunachangia ufanisi hafifu wa uchunguzi na matibabu ya brusela
9.5. Brusela inaweza kudhibitiwa kwa ushirikiano wa sekta za afya ya binadamu nay a wanyama
9. Mtazamo: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
9.6. Matumizi ya miongozo sahihi yanaweza kuboresha uchunguzi na matibabu ya brusela
9.7. Kuhusisha jamii katika ufuatiliaji wa matukio ya afya ngazi ya jamii kunaweza kuboresha utambuzi wa brusela kwa haraka
9.8. Uelemishaji juu ya brusela ni muhimu katika kuchunguza na kudhibiti ugonjwa
9.9. Matumizi ya nyenzo za kidijitali yanaweza kuboresha ufuatiliaji na utoaji taarifa za brusela Zaidi ya mfumo wa makaratasi
10. Je, ni magonjwa yapi mengine unayoyafahamu yanayoambukiza kati ya wanyama na binadamu?
Kimeta: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Kimeta: Je, uliwahi kuhakiki uwepo wake katika eneo lako kwa kipindi cha miezi 12 iliyopita: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Kifua Kikuu: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Kifua kikuu: Je, uliwahi kuhakiki uwepo wake katika eneo lako kwa kipindi cha miezi 12 iliyopita: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Homa bonde la ufa: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Homa bonde la ufa: Je, uliwahi kuhakiki uwepo wake katika eneo lako kwa kipindi cha miezi 12 iliyopita: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa

Kichaa cha mbwa: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Kichaa cha mbwa: Je, uliwahi kuhakiki uwepo wake katika eneo lako kwa kipindi cha miezi 12 iliyopita: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Malale: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Malale: Je, uliwahi kuhakiki uwepo wake katika eneo lako kwa kipindi cha miezi 12 iliyopita: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Ekonokokosisi: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa
Ekinokokosisi: Je, uliwahi kuhakiki uwepo wake katika eneo lako kwa kipindi cha miezi 12 iliyopita: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa

Ebola: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa

Mafua makali ya ndege: Je, uliwahi kuhakiki uwepo wake katika eneo lako kwa kipindi cha miezi 12 iliyopita: Jaza idadi ya wagonjwa

11. Changamoto na mapendekezo: Je, ni changamoto zipi wataalamu wa afya mnakutana nazo katika uchunguzi na matibabu ya brusela (dodosa juu ya suluhisho)
11.2. Mapungufu/kukosekana kwa vitendeakazi vya kuchunguza ugonjwa
11.6. Wagonjwa kufika sehemu ya kupata huduma ya afya kwa kuchelewa
11.7. Ushirikiano hafifu baina ya sekta husika
12.2. Kama anatumia simu janja, ni aina gani ya OS inatumia?
12.3 Je unaweza elezeaje uwezo wa intaneti katika eneo lako
